product_name: DC Mora Boa Snowboard Boots - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: The DC Mora Boa(R) women's snowboard boots feature dual-zone closures for a quick and easy fit. Stiff flex makes the DC Mora boots the right choice for all-mountain riding. Boa(R) Focus lacing features 2 fit zones that tighten independently; it concentrates closure on the instep and holds the heel securely no matter how the upper is cranked. Boa H3 Coiler scoops up loose cable when entering and exiting the boot; put your foot in, pull back on the tongue, twist the reel a few times and you're off. Custom-moldable EVA memory foam liners feature a power strap around the cuffs and an elastic strap over the insteps for support; anatomic J-bars enhance the support. Cushioned, dual-density EVA footbeds support feet so you can ride stronger and longer; internal ankle harnesses hold liners in place and lock heels down for amazing control. Articulated tongues and molded backstays offer support, and help you control your edges during toe-side and heel-side turns. Unilite outsoles provide durability, damping and cushioning; snow-shedding traction tread ensures sure footing.
short_description: The DC Mora Boa(R) women's snowboard boots feature dual-zone closures for a quick and easy fit. Stiff flex makes the DC Mora boots the right choice for all-mountain riding.
